r = game:service("RunService") local sword = script.Parent.Handle local Tool = script.Parent
local damage = 5 local p = nil local humanoid = nil
local slash_damage = 5 local regularWalk = 23
local hasRiddleSkull = false
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
--local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") --SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" --SlashSound.Parent = sword --SlashSound.Volume = .7 -- --local LungeSound = Instance.new("Sound") --LungeSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordlunge.wav" --LungeSound.Parent = sword --LungeSound.Volume = .6
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = sword UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
-- magical sword sound has id of 25256253... for fast slashes, like swordslash.wav (SlashSound)
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
function spinAttack(vChar) humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then return end local torso = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then
local spinForce = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") spinForce.P = 1000000 spinForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0,-20,0) spinForce.maxTorque = Vector3.new(spinForce.P,spinForce.P,spinForce.P) spinForce.Parent = torso if hasRiddleSkull then debris:AddItem(spinForce, 5) else debris:AddItem(spinForce, 1) end
if hasRiddleSkull then local strikeForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") strikeForce.velocity = (humanoid.TargetPoint - vChar.Head.Position).unit * 50 strikeForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000, 0, 100000) strikeForce.Name = "StrikeForce" strikeForce.Parent = torso
debris:AddItem(strikeForce, 5) end end end
function attack() SlashSound = sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if SlashSound ~= nil then SlashSound:play() end vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter ~= nil and vCharacter.Name ~= "Backpack" then --vPlay = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) --if vPlay == nil then return end --if (vPlay.Backpack:FindFirstChild("RiddlingSkull") ~= nil) then hasRiddleSkull = true if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("RiddlingSkull") ~= nil then hasRiddleSkull = true else hasRiddleSkull = false end spinAttack(vCharacter) else return end damage = slash_damage wait(.75) SlashSound = sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if SlashSound ~= nil then SlashSound:play() end --if SlashSound == nil then -- SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") -- SlashSound.Volume = .7 -- SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" -- SlashSound.Name = "SlashSound" -- SlashSound.Parent = sword --end end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function swordOut() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1,0,0) end
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; if character.Name == "Backpack" or character == nil then return end local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
attack()
wait(.5) local count = 0 if hasRiddleSkull then for i = 1, 35 do torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil then strikeForce = torso:FindFirstChild("StrikeForce") if strikeForce ~= nil then strikeForce.velocity = (humanoid.TargetPoint - character.Head.Position).unit * 50 end end wait(.1) count = count + 1 if count > 7 then SlashSound = sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if SlashSound ~= nil then SlashSound:play() end count = 0 end end end --4 more seconds of slashing Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() SlashSound = sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if SlashSound == nil then SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = sword SlashSound.Volume = .7 SlashSound.Name = "SlashSound" end
UnsheathSound:play() end
function onUnequipped() SlashSound = sword:FindFirstChild("SlashSound") if SlashSound ~= nil then SlashSound:Stop() SlashSound.Parent = nil SlashSound = nil end end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)

enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end

if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
